amendment.description: To deny members who oppose cost-of-living adjustments (COLAs) the increase.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2934 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2934 proposed by Senator Inhofe. (consideration: CR S1870-1871; text: CR S1871) To deny members who oppose cost-of-living adjustments (COLAs) the increase.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2934 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2934 proposed by Senator Inhofe.
